wake_up: ^"Squaak! Rise and shine, Cap’n. Catching up on beauty sleep? Not that that will help your ugly mug."
^If the sea had a grudge against me, it was really playing into the dramatics.
^Losing my ship, crew, golden compass and what little dignity I had left? Yup, check.
^And just as I was beginning to enjoy my pity party, a bird decides to scream directly into my eardrums.
^"Oh great, a feathered alarm clock with no off button."
^"You lost everything but your sass I see. This ain't our old beauty of a ship, she…floats, mostly."
^"Oh and guess what? You OVERSLEPT. Your new crew’s probably plotting your demise already, why don’t you look at their CVs."
